CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 4, 1960, pg. A11 reads: "Home-A-Rama Bride Showered - Pretty Miss Gloria Walker, who will become a bride on June 7, during The Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama at Syria Mosque, was showered prettily by her bridesmaids last week. Above at the shower, are, front: Vera Thompson, Miss Walker, and Sarah Burney.  Others are Shirley Baker, Sylvia Page, Ann Sharpe, Jacqueline Scott, Shirley Luca, Beverly Monford and Molly Sharpe. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of bride-to-be Gloria Walker, seated between Vera Thompson (Matthews) and Sarah Burney; with guests including Shirley Baker, Sylvia Page, Ann Sharpe, Jacqueline Scott, Shirley Luca, Beverly Monford and Molly Sharpe, posed in living room for bridal shower, possibly in home at 7142 Monticello Street, Homewood, another version
